00035     void MatrixHelper::CutRowFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const uint &start,
00036         const uint &end)
00037       {
00038         std::cout << "Start Row: " << start << " End Row: " << end << " Size: "
00039             << D->size() << std::endl;
00040         try
00041           {
00042             if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->size()))
00043             throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,(uint)D->size());
00044             D->erase(D->begin()+start, D->begin()+end);
00045           }
00046         catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00047           {
00048 
00049           }
00050       }
00051 
00052     void MatrixHelper::CutColumnFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const uint &start,
00053         const uint &end)
00054       {
00055         std::cout << "Start Column: " << start << " End Column: " << end
00056             << " Size: " << D->size() << std::endl;
00057         for (uint i=0; i<=D->size()-1; i++)
00058           {
00059             try
00060               {
00061                 if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->at(i).size()))
00062                 throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,D->at(i).size());
00063                 D->at(i).erase(D->at(i).begin()+start, D->at(i).begin()+end);
00064               }
00065             catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00066               {
00067 
00068               }
00069           }
00070       }

00072     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitializeScoreMatrixDistances(
00073         const bpp::Sequence* A, const bpp::Sequence* B,
00074         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00075       {
00076         //Initialize Score Matrix
00077         ScoreMatrix D = InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B,
00078             numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
00079 
00080         D[0][0] = 0;
00081 
00082         D[0][1] = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(0))
00083             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(0));
00084         for (uint i=2; i<D[0].size(); i++)
00085           D[0][i] = D[0][i-1] + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(i-1));
00086 
00087         D[1][0] = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(0))
00088             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(0));
00089         for (uint i=2; i<D.size(); i++)
00090           D[i][0] = D[i-1][0] + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00091 
00092         return D;
00093       }
00094 
00095     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitScoreMatrixWith(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00096         const bpp::Sequence* B, const double &init)
00097       {
00098         //Initialize Score Matrix with inf
00099         ScoreMatrix P(A->size()+1, vector<double>(B->size() +1, init));
00100 
00101         return P;
00102       }

00104     BoolMatrix MatrixHelper::CreateAdjacenceGraph(
00105         Alignment* pairWiseAlignments, uint biggestSequenceSize)
00106       {
00107         //Construct Graph as Adjacence Matrix
00108         valarray <bool> tmp(false, biggestSequenceSize);
00109         BoolMatrix G(tmp, pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences()/2);
00110 
00111         cout << "constructing Graph"<< endl;
00112         for (uint i=1; i<pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences(); i +=2)
00113           {
00114 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00115 #pragma omp parallel for shared(G)
00116 #endif 
00117             for (uint j=0; j<pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->size(); j++)
00118               {
00119                 //Check for match or not mismatch := !gap
00120                 if (pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->getValue(j) != -1)
00121                   G[i/2][j] = true;
00122                 else
00123                   G[i/2][j] = false;
00124               }
00125           }
00126 
00127         return G;
00128       }

00130     int MatrixHelper::SearchMinimuminlastRow(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00131         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00132       {
00133 
00134         int i = M->size()-1;
00135         int j = M->at(0).size()-1;
00136         double minScore = M->at(i).at(j);
00137 
00138         for (uint k=1; k<=M->size()-1; k++)
00139           {
00140             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(k).at(M->at(0).size()-1), minScore) != minScore)
00141               {
00142                 i = k;
00143                 minScore = M->at(k).at(M->at(0).size()-1);
00144               }
00145           }
00146         return i;
00147 
00148       }
00149     int MatrixHelper::SearchMinimuminlastColumn(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00150         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00151       {
00152         int i = M->size()-1;
00153         int j = M->at(0).size()-1;
00154         double minScore = M->at(i).at(j);
00155 
00156         for (uint k=1; k<=M->at(0).size()-1; k++)
00157           {
00158             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(M->size()-1).at(k), minScore) != minScore)
00159               {
00160                 j = k;
00161                 minScore = M->at(M->size()-1).at(k);
00162               }
00163           }
00164         return j;
00165 
00166       }
00167     double &MatrixHelper::SearchMinimumPosition(const ScoreMatrix* M, int &i,
00168         int &j, double &minScore, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00169       {
00170         minScore = M->at(i).at(j);
00171         int tempI = SearchMinimuminlastRow(M, scoreM);
00172         int tempJ = SearchMinimuminlastColumn(M, scoreM);
00173 
00174         if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(minScore, M->at(tempI).at(j)) != minScore)
00175           if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(tempI).at(j) , M->at(i).at(tempJ)) == M->at(i).at(tempJ))
00176             {
00177               j = tempJ;
00178               minScore = M->at(i).at(tempJ);
00179             }
00180           else
00181             {
00182               i = tempI;
00183               minScore = M->at(tempI).at(j);
00184             }
00185         return minScore;
00186       }
